msItem.colophon: ወተፅሕ[ፈ]ት፡ ዛቲ፡ መጽሐፍ፡ በ፳ወ፱፡ ዓመተ፡ ምሕረት፡ እንዘ፡ ንጉሥነ፡ ው[ድ]ም፡ ወጳጳስነ፡ አባ፡ ሰላማ፡ ወመኰንን፡ [ዴ]ራስጐኒ፡ ወዐቃቤ፡ ሰዓት፡ <...> ወለእመ፡ ቦዘተኃየላ፡ ወዘተአጋላ፡ እመሂ፡ መኰንን፡ ወእመዚ፡ ስዩም፡ ውጉዛ፡ ለይኩን፡ በአፈ፡ ፲ወ፪ሐዋርያት፡ … The note states that the Ms. was written in 29 year of mercy (= 1377 A.D., cp. ChChron 161) and during the time of King Wǝdǝm and of Metropolitan ʾabbā Salāma and of governor Derāsgwana (?). It is not clear if this note is the colophon of the Ms. or of the work. King Wǝdǝm probably is king Wǝdǝm ʾAsfare, the regnal name of king Nǝwāya Māryām, who was on the throne from 1371 to 1380 (cp. EAE III, 1175). ʾAbba Salāma must be ʾabbā Salāma “the Translator”, the Metropolitan of the Ethiopian Church from 1348 (or 1350) to 1388 (or 1390) (cp. EAE IV, 488-89). At the end, mention of the commissioner, Tasfā Ḥawāryāt, and of the name of the church, ʾAdd Qʷǝlqʷāl (a part of this note has been erased).

supportDesc.condition: The Ms. is in poor condition. Both boards are missing; the sewing is heavily damaged (for the most part missing) and crudely repaired; a synthetic material is used to cover the spine. Several fols. are missing and many others misplaced. The Ms. has been affected by humidity. Several fols. are damaged by rodents. Cuts crudely repaired on fols. 2 and 103. Many fols. have irregular size.

layout.ab: the number of lines varies from 26 to 37/38 (in fols. 158ra-169rb)
The upper line is written below the ruling.
The bottom line is written above the ruling.
A ruled line has left empty by the scribe at the bottom of fol. 111rb.
The ruling is not always uniform and regular.

handNote.date: Second half of the XIV century.
handNote.seg: Some lines (3-5) alternating with black lines, in the incipit of each text (both columns for Texts I-2 and I-23); sometimes the first lines of the account proper; Ethiopic numerals; elements of the punctuation signs and caesura signs (crux ansata and coronis).

The handwriting is characterized by right-sloping letters with rounded and curved shapes (e.g., ግ ወ በ), with a few others more angular (e.g., መ ዐ). The quality often changes throughout the Ms., creating an impression that more than one hands was involved in writing (s., e.g., 93va, 93vb-94rb).
- ጵ has the 6th order marker set up on the vertical stroke at the top, oriented to the left (e.g., 17vb l.7).

- ኴ has the loop marking the 5th order open (s., e.g., 111rb l.4); sometimes it has the 6th and the 7th order markers set up on the vertical stroke at the top and directed to the right (s. 130va l.18, 113vb l.12);
- መ (esp. in the 1st and 2nd orders) has the loops not completely separated and of triangular shape, with the left loop more pointed downwards (s., e.g., 28va l.5).
- the numerals are without dashes above and below;
- ፪ has the loops, closed, not separated;

- the crux ansata and coronis (separated or together) are used in the Ms. several times: at the end of the texts, as caesura (s., e.g., 169v), or in the margins, usually at the incipit of them (s., e.g., 26r, 28v);

item.foreign: Gadla Ḥawāryāt of (the church of) ʾAdd Qʷǝlqʷal.

item.note: Written in a faded ink, in a 16th-cent. (?) hand.

list.item: - In 39v, number ፶ (cue for the rubricator) is written in the left margin of column b, repeating the same (rubricated) number in the text column.
- Corrections (omitted words or letters) written interlineally, e.g., on 40ra, 53vb, 137va, 138va.
- Crude notes and doodles in pen or in pencil, e.g., in fols. 1r, 2r, 9r, 54r, 138r, 139r, 150r, 170v; crude drawings on 2v and 170v.
- Personal names crudely written (in pen or in a faded ink) on 1vb (below the text), 53rb (below the text), 169v (below the text) and 170r.
In 99v: mention of the commissioner of the Ms., Tasfā Ḥawāryāt (s. also "Colophon").
- The invocation from the scribe, ስረዩ፡ ወባርኩኒ፡ (“forgive[me] and bless me”), has been written after the text in 2vb and 12rb.
- The scribe tends to start a new paragraph (after the four dots or nine dots asterisks) on the new ruled line.

item.desc: - Readings are indicated by the commemoration dates, written in the same hand, in red, in the upper margin: አመ፲፪፡ ለጥቅመ[sic]ት፡: fol. 12v አመ፡ ፳ወ፪፡ ለጥቅምት: fol. 28v አመ፡ ፰፡ ለኅዳር: fol. 32v አመ፡ ፬፡ ለታኅሣሥ፡: fol. 38r በማርቆስ፡ ምንባብ፡ fol. 55v አመ፡ ፳፮(?)፡ ለግንቦት፡: fol. 59v አመ፡ ፪፡ ለኀምሌ፡: fol. 76r አመ፡ ፭፡ ጴጥሮስ፡ ወጳውሎስ፡: fol. 88v አመ፡ ፲ለኀምሌ፡: fol. 100r አመ፡ ፲ወ፰፡ ወኀምሌ፡: fol. 106r አመ፡ ፴፡ ለነሓሲ[sic]፡: fol. 111v አመ፡ ፲፡ ለየካቲት፡: fol. 136r አመ፡ ፰፡ ለመጋቢት፡: fol. 137r አመ፡ ፬፡ ለጥር፡: fol. 149v.
